name: Tivoli Hotel
address: Arni Magnussons Gade 2, 1577 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Featuring a sauna, a swimming pool and free wireless internet access in all areas, Tivoli Hotel Copenhagen is situated in Copenhagen and offers trendy accommodation. It features city views and 4-star rooms. Guests can make the most of the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the lounge bar. For those travelling with children Tivoli Hotel Copenhagen offers babysitting/child services, a playground and a kids club. This hotel provides rooms with an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. They all have tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and a laptop safe. Tivoli Hotel boasts convenient dining options, including international and local cuisines at Tivoli Brasserie and local food at MASH Penthouse. Each evening, guests are able to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Tivoli Hotel is close to shops, dining and Copenhagen's nightlife. It is also within walking distance of the Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek, Daemonen and Tivoli Gardens.Revato

name: Copenhagen Marriott Hotel
description: Experience a luxury getaway at Copenhagen Marriott Hotel, one of the finest modern hotels in Denmark. Discover spacious, beautifully appointed hotel rooms that rank among some of the largest in Copenhagen, Denmark. Each is a downtown oasis with complimentary Wi-Fi access, a sleek marble bathroom, flat-screen TV and floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase mesmerizing views of the Copenhagen city center. Indulge in international cuisine and captivating harbor views from our restaurants and bars, including a beautiful outdoor terrace. Host impressive business meetings and conferences in our modern, canal-view venues. With a picturesque waterfront location in Copenhagen city center, we're near Tivoli Gardens, Harbor Beach, and famed Stroget Street. The Copenhagen Marriott Hotel provides an ideal backdrop for business and leisure guests alike.Marriott

name: Crowne Plaza Copenhagen Towers
description: Stay at our sustainable, high-end hotel near Bella Center conference venue, with 24-hour transport links to central Copenhagen. Conveniently located off the E20 motorway, Crowne Plaza® Copenhagen Towers hotel offers easy access to central Copenhagen and to Malmö in Sweden. It's a short walk to Ørestad train and metro station. We are located 7 km from Copenhagen Airport, and we offer secure parking. Copenhagen’s popular visitor attractions, such as Tivoli Gardens, the world-famous Little Mermaid, and Copenhagen Zoo, can be reached with ease. Take a leisurely canal cruise or sample some Danish lager at the Carlsberg Brewery. Field’s, Denmark’s largest shopping mall, is next door to the hotel. We offer a 24-hour Business Centre, 21 meeting rooms and a dedicated and professional staff. Our accommodations offer free WiFi throughout the hotel, and each room is equipped with Scandinavian design furniture, TV, air-condition, and spacious bathrooms. Our sustainable hotel includes solar panels and groundwater-based cooling. Enjoy a relaxing cocktail followed by organic Nordic cuisine in our innovative restaurant and bar, Bark, which is located in our stunning "green" atrium.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Bella Sky Copenhagen
description: Experience 4-star sophistication in Denmark's capital city with the beautifully-designed accommodations and deluxe amenities at AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen. Boasting a location near the airport and the vibrant city center, our hotel is steps away from the train station which allows for easy exploration of local attractions including Tivoli Gardens and Amager Common. Unpack your bags in modern hotel rooms with pillow top bedding, floor-to-ceiling windows and authentic Danish design. Then explore our hotel's luxurious amenities, including a fitness center and delicious restaurants. Start your day with the hot breakfast buffet and savor locally-sourced fare for lunch or dinner. If visiting Copenhagen for business, plan your next successful event in the adjacent Bella Center and tackle projects with our hotel's complimentary Wi-Fi, parking and on-site business center. We're ready to make your visit memorable at AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen.Marriott

name: Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby
description: Set in Aarhus, 32 km from Memphis Mansion, Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 5 km from Steno Museum. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby. Aarhus Natural History Museum is 5 km from the accommodation, while Aarhus University is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 36 km from Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby.

name: Scandic Roskilde Park
description: Located a short stroll from Roskilde Railway Station, the hotel offers guests an ideal base when visiting Roskilde. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a sauna and a playground. This 4-star hotel provides meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and luggage storage. There is also free public parking on site for guests travelling with a car. Rooms have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. They all feature a desk, ironing facilities and heating. Scandic Roskilde Park houses a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind of an evening. For those preferring to dine out, the surrounding area features a number of bars and restaurants with a range of different cuisines. Scandic Roskilde Park is close to the area's well-known tourist attractions, nightlife and shops, and FC Roskilde is within walking distance. Roskilde Cathedral is in close proximity to the property.Revato

name: Comwell Roskilde
description: Boasting views of the Roskilde Fjord, Comwell Roskilde offers free parking and rooms with cable TV and WiFi access. Roskilde city centre is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Seasonal dishes based on fresh produce accompanied by selected wines are served at Comwell Roskilde’s restaurant. Drinks are available in the hotel bar, featuring a terrace with fjord views. Leisure facilities include table football, billiards and a fitness room. The area offers great opportunities for jogging and bicycling. The property has several cosy terraces, pavilions and patios. A bus stop with connections to Roskilde city centre is situated 500 metres away. The Viking Ship Museum is 2 km from the hotel.

name: Scandic Aalborg Øst
description: This comfortable hotel in Aalborg offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as free bicycle rental and a sauna. It also features meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage, a concierge and room service. It is pet-friendly and has free private parking on site for guests with a car. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and has an in-room safe, a desk and blackout curtains. There are also several rooms geared towards families. Scandic Aalborg Ost offers a variety of in-house dining options, including a cosy restaurant and a bar. Scandic Aalborg Ost is within walking distance of Aalborg University. Aalborgtarnet, Aalborghus Castle and Budolfi Church are only an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Skagen Motel
description: Situated in central Skagen, this motel offers free parking and rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. Skagen Train Station is a 15-minute walk away. All the brightly decorated rooms at Skagen Motel include a sofa. Other facilities include a work desk and wardrobe. Bicycles can be rented on site. Relaxation options include a garden and a terrace. Breakfast is served each morning in the dining room. Skagen Harbour is 1 km from Motel Skagen. The Sand-Covered Church is a 7-minute drive away.

name: Nexø Hostel
description: Nexø Modern Hostel is in the coastal town of Nexø, on picturesque Bornholm. WiFi and parking are free. Dueodde Beach, the island’s largest and most popular, is within 10 minutes’ drive. Communal kitchenettes and shared bathrooms are found on each floor of Nexø Hostel. Kitchen facilities include an oven, kettle and microwave. A laundry room is also available. The guest lounge or furnished garden are ideal for relaxation. You can purchase coffee on site. Sommerfuglepark & Tropeland is directly across the road from Hostel Nexø. It features a tropical garden and butterfly park. Restaurants, small shops and the popular waterfront are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Essenbaekgaard B&B
description: Essenbaekgaard B&B has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Assentoft, 7.1 km from Memphis Mansion. Featuring a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast. Essenbaekgaard B&B offers a picnic area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Randers Regnskov - Tropical Forest is 8.6 km from Essenbaekgaard B&B, while Djurs Sommerland is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 35 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Radisson Blu Papirfabrikken Hotel, Silkeborg
description: This hotel is housed in a former paper mill by the Gudenå River, 10 minutes’ walk from Silkeborg Museum. Guests can enjoy free internet access and free parking. A tea/coffee maker, minibar and cable TV are featured in all rooms at Radisson Blu Hotel i Papirfabrikken Silkeborg. Bathrobes and slippers, are found in some rooms. Facilities at Hotel i Papirfabrikken include a restaurant, bar and terrace with river views. Guests receive a discount to the gym housed in the same building. The area's surrounding lakes offer activities such as hiking, fishing and sailing. Silkeborg Golf Course is only a 10-minute drive away.

name: Comwell Kolding
description: Set beside Marielund Forest, just 1 km from Kolding Train Station, this hotel offers free WiFi. Comwell Kolding’s bright rooms have large windows, as well as a desk and a flat-screen TV. The hotel has a sauna and indoor pool. Other leisure options include billiards, table tennis and a summertime children’s playroom. Comwell Kolding’s restaurant offers seasonal menus, while Jes or No Bar provides light meals. The nearby forest provides nice hiking and jogging opportunities. A bus stop with connections to Kolding is 50 metres away.

name: Hotel Skjern
description: Hotel Skjern is located on a quiet pedestrian street in the town of Skjern, just opposite the train station. It offers modern rooms with free WiFi and free parking. All rooms feature a work desk, seating area and cable TV. An electric kettle is provided in each room. General facilities at Skjern Hotel include a children’s playroom and a cosy lounge with newspapers. Golf, fishing and hiking are popular activities in the area around Hotel Skjern. River Skjern is only 600 metres away.

name: Motel Skive
description: Motel Skive is surrounded by nature and lies close to Skive Fjord, 2 km from central Skive. It offers free WiFi, private parking and guest rooms with private bathroom facilities. All guests at Motel Skive have access to a fully equipped kitchenette and a communal lounge with a large flat-screen TV. Ironing equipment can be borrowed at the reception. Motel Skive has a laundry room with washing machines and tumble dryers. Nearby facilities include a bowling alley, a cinema and two sports centres. Skive Water Park is only 200 metres away from the hostel.

name: Glostrup Park Hotel
description: This eco-friendly hotel is within 20 minutes’ drive of Copenhagen Airport, the city and the Bella Center. It offers an award-winning restaurant, free parking and free access to the wellness facilities. Flat-screen TVs, tea/coffee facilities and minibars are standard at Glostrup Park. Free Wi-Fi internet is offered throughout the hotel. The wellness centre has a sauna, solarium and gym. Steam rooms and massage showers are also available. Other relaxation options include Glostrup Park Hotel’s lobby fireplace and a TV lounge. The La Cocotte restaurant and wine cellar specialises in Danish-French cuisine made from fresh, seasonal ingredients.

name: Golf Hotel Viborg
address: Hans Tausens Allé 2, 8800 Viborg, Central Jutland
description: Golf Hotel Viborg enjoys a tranquil setting by Søndersø Lake, a 10-minute walk from Viborg Cathedral. It offers free on-site parking and rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Golf Hotel Viborg include an electric kettle, work desk and a private bathroom with shower. Many rooms offer lake views and are furnished with classic Chesterfield furniture. Danish cuisine is available at Restaurant Brænderigaarden and Restaurant Golf Salonen. A buffet breakfast is served every day. Drinks are available in the bar. The hotel have all facilities to both relax and do execierces, with outdoor and indoor swimming pool. The Spa offers Sauna, Steambath, outdoor spa for up to 10 people and cold shock pool. And a new Fitness Center is also available. The staff can help arrange green fees on local golf courses. The 27-hole Viborg Golf Course is a 7-minute drive away. The Skovgaard Museum is located 650 metres away.

name: Nyborg Strand
description: Overlooking the Great Belt strait, Nyborg Strand is a beachfront property just 2 km from Nyborg’s Old Town. Odense city centre is within 30 minutes' drive. The on-site spa offers a sauna, hot tubs and a rain shower area. A cold water basin, relax lounge and foot baths are also featured. All rooms at Nyborg Strand include a TV, a work desk and a private bathroom. Tea/coffee facilities are also available in the rooms. Restaurant Stranden serves seasonal Danish and French cuisine. Grilled dishes are available at Bistroen, which features an outdoor terrace. Stjernebaren serves chilled beers and drinks in a relaxing atmosphere. Guests can exercise in the well-equipped gym, and play billiards or boules on site. The garden features a putting green, and a play area is available for children during summer months. Parking and WiFi are free. St Knud's Golf Club is 3 km from the hotel. Nyborg Fortress is a 5-minute drive away. Tennis and squash facilities are found nearby.

name: Scandic Silkeborg
description: Situated in Silkeborg, Scandic Silkeborg offers 3-star accommodation, as well as a sauna and an indoor pool. Those staying at the property also have access to free wireless internet and on-site parking. Every room at Scandic Silkeborg features a private bathroom and all the necessities for a comfortable stay. All provide an in-room safe, a desk and a flat-screen TV. Scandic Silkeborg houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax of an evening. Guests are able to start the morning with a sumptuous buffet breakfast each day. Scandic Silkeborg offers disabled parking for guests with a car. Karup Airport is within a 40-minute drive.Revato

name: Hotel Korning Kro
description: Situated in the village of Korning, this property offers free Wi-Fi, an in-house restaurant, as well as rooms with cable TV and a private bathroom. Central Horsens is 15 minutes' drive away. Hotel Korning Kro's restaurant offers quality Danish and international cuisine made from fresh, seasonal ingredients. Guests can try traditional stews or roasts as well as French-flavoured dishes. Relaxation options include a furnished courtyard garden. Children will enjoy the on-site playground. Free parking is possible on site. Givskud Zoo is 30 km away, while Legoland Theme Park is 40 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Hotel Troense
description: Located on the idyllic island of Tåsinge, this waterfront hotel overlooks Troense’s harbour and the Great Belt strait. It offers a sea-view restaurant and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Troense’s guest rooms are housed in 3 charming buildings with either sea or garden views. Each has a TV, work desk, along with a seating area. Some feature a private patio. Troense Hotel’s restaurant offers a varied à la carte menu. In summer, guests can enjoy their meals out on the terrace. Valdemars Castle and Egeskov Palace are both within 20 minutes’ drive of Hotel Troense. Svendborg and the island of Funen are only 6 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Milling Hotel Park
description: Situated 100 metres from Middelfart Train Station, this hotel is about 1.5 km from Middelfart’s harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and an on-site restaurant serving traditional Danish cuisine. A flat-screen TV with cable channels and classical décor are standard to each Hotel Park guest room. Some also have a spacious seating area. Free hot beverages and fruit are available all day, along with free cake and popcorn in the afternoon. During nice weather, guests can take their meals onto Park Hotel’s terrace. Communal facilities include a games room with billiards, darts and table tennis. An internet computer in the lobby is also available. The 12th-century St. Nicholas Church and Lillebælt Golf Club are both within 20 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Legoland Theme Park is 1-hour drive away.

name: Montra Skaga Hotel
description: Skaga Hotel is conveniently located just 100 metres from Nordsøen Oceanarium. It offers free on-site parking and rooms with free WiFi. Color Line Ferry Terminal is just 500 metres away, while Fjord Line and Smyril Line Ferry Terminals are 1.5 km away. All rooms at Hotel Skaga have a TV, a seating area and a work desk. The rooms come with a bathroom and shower. Guests can enjoy a game of table tennis or pool in the games room or relax in the sauna. The Panorama Restaurant offers a buffet breakfast, à la carte dishes, daily specials and a children's menu. Drinks are available in the cosy lounge area. Lilleheden Train Station is a 3-minute walk away. Hirtshals Golf Club is 4 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Søma Sisimiut
address: Frederik D Ix Plads Nr 5, Sisimiut 3911
description: Hotel SØMA Sisimiut is located just 40 km from the Polar Circle and offers a 24 hr reception and a cafeteria. Sisimiut Harbour is just a 5-minute walk from the property. Hotel SØMA Sisimiut rooms all have private bathrooms and a flat-screen TV. The family rooms feature views towards the church and local museum. The in-house café at Hotel SØMA Sisimiut serves breakfast, sandwiches and light lunches. Packed lunches can be ordered at a surcharge. Laundry facilities and Wi-Fi are available at a surcharge at Hotel SØMA Sisimiut. There is also a common living room with magazines, newspapers and books to read. Hotel SØMA arranges various range of popular activities such as sailing, kayak trips or whale watching in the summer and snow mobile tours and dog sleigh rides in the winter. The hotel has outdoor wellness with a view over the valley and mountains is where you will experience the ultimate arctic spa experience. Staff at Hotel SØMA Sisimiut can help arrange airport or boat shuttles for guests.

name: Hotel Djurhuus
description: Hotel Djurhuus is situated only a 9 minute walk from Tórshavn city centre and 350m from Tórshavn harbour. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi and free private self parking. Breakfast is always included in the stay and guests can relax with free hot beverages in our lounge area on 2nd floor overlooking the magnificent views of the coast line and neighboring island. The rooms at Hotel Djurhuus have a private bathroom with heated floors. Satellite TV, a work desk and a coffee machine. Several rooms also have a sea view. Extra bed/crib as well as laundry service can be arranged on request. The staff will gladly assist with recommendations for dining, nightlife and sightseeing tours. An airport shuttle from Vágar Airport can also be arranged.

name: Giljanes Hostel
description: No description found
